com.binghamton.jhelp.ast

Class TryCatchBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.binghamton.jhelp.ast.ASTNode
      • com.binghamton.jhelp.ast.Statement
        • com.binghamton.jhelp.ast.TryCatchBlock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Visitable, java.lang.Comparable<ASTNode>

    public class TryCatchBlock
extends Statement
    A class representing a Java try/catch/finally block

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TryCatchBlock(org.antlr.v4.runtime.Token keyword, Block tryBody, java.util.List<CatchBlock> catches)

      TryCatchBlock(org.antlr.v4.runtime.Token keyword, Block tryBody, java.util.List<CatchBlock> catches, Block finallyBody)
      Construct a try/catch/finally block
      TryCatchBlock(org.antlr.v4.runtime.Token keyword, java.util.List<VariableDeclaration> resources, Block tryBody, java.util.List<CatchBlock> catches, Block finallyBody)
      Construct a try-with-resources block, possibly with a catch or finally block

                     Block tryBody,
                     java.util.List<CatchBlock> catches)
        Construct a try/catch block without a finally block
        Parameters:
        keyword - the try keyword
        tryBody - the code to try to execute
        catches - the list of catch statement to execute on exception

      • TryCatchBlock

        public TryCatchBlock(org.antlr.v4.runtime.Token keyword,
                     Block tryBody,
                     java.util.List<CatchBlock> catches,
                     Block finallyBody)
        Construct a try/catch/finally block
        Parameters:
        keyword - the try keyword
        tryBody - the code to try to execute
        catches - the list of catch statement to execute on exception
        finallyBody - the block to always execute at end

      • TryCatchBlock

        public TryCatchBlock(org.antlr.v4.runtime.Token keyword,
                     java.util.List<VariableDeclaration> resources,
                     Block tryBody,
                     java.util.List<CatchBlock> catches,
                     Block finallyBody)
        Construct a try-with-resources block, possibly with a catch or finally block
        Parameters:
        keyword - the try keyword
        resources - the list of resources within the try block
        tryBody - the code to try to execute
        catches - the list of catch statement to execute on exception
        finallyBody - the block to always execute at end
